snippet: The group sued the Monster Beverage Corporation, a maker of energy drinks, over the use of its music in an online video promotion.
abstract: The group sued the Monster Beverage Corporation, a maker of energy drinks, over the use of its music in an online video promotion.

headline.main: Beastie Boys Win $1.7 Million in Suit Over Unauthorized Use of Music
headline.print_headline: Beastie Boys Win Suit Over Use of Music
